abstract.t: Source address validation (SAV) plays a significant role in defending against various attacks based on source IP address spoofing. BCP84 [RFC3704][RFC8704] provides practical SAV mechanisms, i.e., uRPF- based approaches, for inter-domain scenarios. However, current uRPF- based SAV mechanisms have limitations in accuracy and incentive [draft-wu-savnet-inter-domain-problem-statement]. This document provides an architecture of inter-domain SAVNET which actively advertises AS paths to other ASes for generating accurate SAV rules and improving incentive.
